content: Just for my information , the ressource page and documentation pages (for example https://www.hl7.org/fhir/allergyintolerance.html) are done with which tool ?

It's a custom set of tooling that leverages the FHIR Java reference implementation. The source for the specification is maintained here: https://gforge.hl7.org/svn/fhir/trunk/build. (You can sign on as anonymous)
